Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: N. Spears
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera today. It is a genuine Foscam. This camera is great. It was easy to set up, but I am a Cisco engineer, so I don't know if it will be so simple for the average Joe. Anyway, the manual is detailed enough to walk someone through setting it up. The picture isn't the greatest, but for the price I cannot complain. It serves it's purpose. The controls through the browser works perfectly. I did however notice lag when I had enabled audio. This was on wireless. I have Wireless-N, but this camera has only Wireless-G. Nevertheless, I will be purchasing more of these to place in several spots in the house. I told my kids I might put one in each of their rooms. They really don't like that idea. Haha!

Reviews.Title: Good Picture - NO Sound!
Reviews.Author: R. Reeder
Reviews.Content: Foscam FI8908W Good little camera with cool capabilities but NO sound during live monitoring (it does record sound). Contacted seller for help. He replaced camera (I paid for return shipping.) and it did not produce sound during live monitoring either. He then sent me to manufacturer. Manufacturer suggested a couple of things without success. They then asked for more info and I sent. Have not heard from them for over a week now. It is a great little camera if you don't need sound.

Reviews.Title: works well for a year or so, has drawbacks
Reviews.Author: P. Cahill
Reviews.Content: Good:initial setup is not terribly hardwhen brand new, LED's provide astounding zero light imagery.web interface is easy to usebad:no way to set LED's to turn on and off automatically (via timer, fixed time, etc) so after a year or so, they will lose signifigant lighting power.I had some issues where i reset my router and could not access the cameras without power cycling them first.conclusion:Will try something different next time.  I have two of these and haven't been overly impressed after the wow-factor goes away.

Reviews.Title: Hard to Rate
Reviews.Author: M. J. Klement "mikeklement.com"
Reviews.Content: The camera works great, great features, great price but the service is horrible, support isnt great and you really have to know what you are doing to get it setup and working with your router and firewall. I am an IT admin and it takes a lot of work to setup and doesnt work with all routers and networks.

Reviews.Title: Foscam review.
Reviews.Author: Allen
Reviews.Content: Seems like a very nice camera. The pan and tilt are flawless. However, it is difficult to set up if you are not a computer wizz. Getting a picture was easy enough but geting wireless and remote access was near impossible. I have built several of my own systems but can't seem to make this thing work over the net yet alone within my own network. Right now it is functioning as a pricey webcam. I'll try again in the morning. Frustrated in Cleveland

ProductInfo.Features:
Simple to setup, Friendly GUI, DIY installation,High image & video quality,Two-way audio monitoring
remote Pan/Tilt control (Pan:300°& Tilt:120°), remote viewing & record from anywhere anytime
Auto IR-LED illumination for night vision (up to 8 metres) ,Freely control IR-LED on/ off
Support IE browser or any other standard browsers,Support both WEP & WPA WPA2 Encryption
Wi-Fi compliant with wireless standards IEEE 802.11b/g,Multi-level users management with password
ProductInfo.Name: Genuine New version smaller and lighter FOSCAM Wi-Fi IP Camera Pan:300?& Tilt:120? with Freely control IR-LED on/off and High image&video quality,2-way audio,night version(Black)
